price: Dan sesungguhnya Kami telah menghukum (Firʻawn  dan) kaumnya dengan (mendatangkan) musim kemarau yang panjang dan kekurangan buah-buahan, supaya mereka mengambil pelajaran.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَخَذۡنَآ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِٱلسِّنِينَ وَنَقۡصٖ مِّنَ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad akhadhnā āla fir'ʿawna bil-sinīna wanaqṣin mina al-thamarāti laʿallahum yadhakkarūna
